short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you land your dream job. Job Match, Resume, Cover Letter and more. Try for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Empowering job seekers, recruiters and students with Skillfi.ai: We strive to bridge the gap between education and the workplace by offering innovative AI-driven tools to help individuals take control of their career paths.

Features:
Job Match – Understand your strengths and identify gaps to improve.
Skill Analysis – Discover the soft and hard skills needed for success in your chosen role.
Improve My Chances – Learn how to enhance your application to stand out.
Networking Strategies – Get guidance on connecting with the right people.
LinkedIn Recommendations – Upgrade your professional profile to align with your goals.
Cover Letter Customization – Personalize your cover letter to highlight your strengths.
Fine-Tuned Resume – Tailored for the specific job requirements.
Interview Prep – Be fully prepared with common questions and ideal answers.
Salary Research – Negotiate the right salary for your position.
Job Elevator Pitch – Develop a compelling presentation for casual conversations.
Thank You Email – Show appreciation after the interview with a well-crafted email.
In addition to these resources, Skillfi.ai helps you explore the demographics of your chosen profession, understand the job description more thoroughly, and find similar roles. Our media recommendations provide insight into relevant literature, movies, and influencers to help you stay informed about the industry you’re entering.

Compatible job board sites: 
- ALL (including LinkedIn, Indeed, Monster and others).

Version history:
1.1 - Auto submit analyze form when a text is marked. Added support for analyzing resumes.
1.0 - First version
